General.Name: Genovate Biotechnology Co Ltd
General.Description: Genovate Biotechnology Co., Ltd. operates as a specialty pharmaceutical company in Taiwan. The company offers central nervous system drugs, cardiovascular drugs, musculoskeletal drugs, immune preparation drugs, anti-infective agents, anticancer drugs, anti-viral drugs, respiratory drugs, genitourinary drugs, and gastrointestinal drugs. Genovate Biotechnology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 1, Gongye 1st Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30351
